sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Domestic Workers' Bill of Rights Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Domestic Workers' Bill of Rights Act.

sections.heading: Purpose and findings. Domestic workers play a critical role in Illinois' economy, working to ensure the health and prosperity of Illinois families and freeing others to participate in the workforce
sections.text: Despite the value of their work, domestic workers have historically been excluded from the protection

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2017.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2017.
